title: “I cannot be too specific” – Arsenal boss Mikel Arteta on Bukayo Saka injury absence (Video)
description: Arsenal star Bukayo Saka has torn his hamstring and faces significant spell on the sidelines, manager Mikel Arteta has confirmed. Mikel Arteta confirms Bukayo Saka has TORN his hamstring: “He’s not looking good, he’s gonna be out for many weeks!”😳 🔗https://t.co/aTCnjr3BEB pic.twitter.com/gXFNt9p2B6 — Hayters TV (@HaytersTV) December 23, 2024 The post “I cannot be too specific” – Arsenal boss Mikel Arteta on Bukayo Saka injury absence (Video) appeared first on Soccer News.
author: Veselin Trajkovic

text: Arsenal star Bukayo Saka has torn his hamstring and faces significant spell on the sidelines, manager Mikel Arteta has confirmed. Mikel Arteta confirms Bukayo Saka has TORN his hamstring: “He’s not looking good, he’s gonna be out for many weeks!”😳 🔗https://t.co/aTCnjr3BEB pic.twitter.com/gXFNt9p2B6 — Hayters TV (@HaytersTV) December 23, 2024
html:
Arsenal star Bukayo Saka has torn his hamstring and faces significant spell on the sidelines, manager Mikel Arteta has confirmed.

Mikel Arteta confirms Bukayo Saka has TORN his hamstring:

“He’s not looking good, he’s gonna be out for many weeks!”😳

🔗https://t.co/aTCnjr3BEB pic.twitter.com/gXFNt9p2B6

— Hayters TV (@HaytersTV) December 23, 2024
